title: unrestricted access as required by MCGM/any Government agencies in case of emergency and submission of registered undertaking to that effect
clause_text: unrestricted access as required by MCGM/any Government agencies in case of emergency and submission of registered undertaking to that effect. In addition to the class-rooms and other areas, every educational building shall be provided with- a tiffin room with a minimum area of 18 sq. m for every 800 students orpart thereof; a separate tiffin room for teachers where strength of students exceeds 1000;

source_pdf.text_snippet: unrestricted access as required by MCGM/any Government agencies in case of emergency and submission of registered undertaking to that effect.
